
% Fancy style
\pagestyle{fancy}

% Page numbers on outer side
\fancyhead[LE,RO]{\thepage}

% Chapters and Sections on inner side
\fancyhead[RE]{\nouppercase{\leftmark}}
\fancyhead[LO]{\nouppercase{\rightmark}}

% No page numbers in foot
\fancyfoot[C]{}

% Fancy header also for pages where new chapter begins
\patchcmd{\chapter}{\thispagestyle{plain}}{\thispagestyle{fancy}}{}{}

% Fancy header also for empty pages (i.e. generated by \clearpage)
\let\Clearpage\clearpage
\def\clearpage{\thispagestyle{fancy}\Clearpage\thispagestyle{fancy}}
